meanings.definition: Covered in a sticky, slimy substance
meanings.sent1: The gooiest slime dripped slowly down the wall.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were the gooiest after playing with the slime.
meanings.sent3: The gooiest mess was impossible to clean up.
meanings.sent4: The swamp was the gooiest place in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The gooiest mud made squelching sounds underfoot.

meanings.definition: Having a texture that is soft and wet
meanings.sent1: The cake was the gooiest dessert I had ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: The gooiest brownie melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: His gooiest socks squelched with every step.
meanings.sent4: The gooiest sponge soaked up all the water.
meanings.sent5: The gooiest marshmallow oozed out of the s'more.

meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to be messy or sticky
meanings.sent1: The gooiest toddler always managed to make a mess.
meanings.sent2: Her gooiest fingers left sticky marks on everything.
meanings.sent3: The gooiest glue dripped onto the table.
meanings.sent4: The gooiest situation required a lot of cleaning up.
meanings.sent5: The gooiest honey stuck to the spoon.
